subject: Email certificate expired
description: The email SSL certificate expired, and users are unable to send emails.
solution: SSL certificate renewed. Confirm with client.

history.message: Hi, we noticed your SSL certificate has expired. Please renew it ASAP.
Thanks for reporting. We've escalated the issue to the infrastructure team.
The SSL certificate has been renewed. Can you verify if email services are back to normal?

subject: Issue with Email certificate
description: Mismatched name on the SSL certificate caused warnings in the browser.
solution: Reissued certificate with correct common name.

history.message: We're seeing browser warnings about the SSL certificate being invalid.
We found the mismatch in common name. A new certificate is being issued.
Certificate replaced successfully. Please check and confirm.

subject: App crashes on login
description: Mobile app crashes after login on Android 13.
solution: Bug reported to dev team, patch in progress.

history.message: After logging in, the app crashes immediately on Android 13 devices.
Confirmed bug on Android 13. Assigned to mobile dev team.
Fix implemented. New version pushed for QA review.

subject: SSL certificate renewal reminder
description: Upcoming SSL cert expiration for domain abc.com.
solution: Set reminder and notified IT team.

history.message: Reminder: SSL certificate will expire in 7 days.
Thanks for the heads-up. We'll renew it in the next deployment window.

subject: Dashboard not loading on mobile
description: White screen when loading dashboard on Safari iOS.
solution: Likely caching issue. Asked for HAR logs.

history.message: On iPhone, the dashboard just shows a blank white screen.
Please try clearing browser cache and send HAR logs if issue persists.

subject: 2FA not working on some accounts
description: Users not receiving OTP via email/SMS.
solution: Testing provider API failures, fallback enabled.

history.message: Multiple users can't log in due to missing 2FA codes.
OTP service logs show failed API calls. Enabled SMS fallback for now.
Password reset link gives expired message right after opening.
Token lifetime was too short. Updated config to allow 15-minute expiry.

subject: Payment gateway timeout error
description: Payment fails intermittently during peak hours.
solution: Increased server timeout. Monitoring traffic spikes.

history.message: Some customers are unable to complete payments after entering card info.
Timeouts traced to spike in backend API. Increased timeout threshold.
Images on homepage are not loading, showing broken links.
Old assets were removed in last deploy. Re-uploaded and refreshed CDN.

subject: Email notifications not being received
description: Notification emails not reaching Gmail addresses.

history.message: Weâ€™re not getting any email notifications after ticket updates.
SPF and DKIM records were not properly configured. Updated and applied.
